title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 363-8.2 - Reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 363-8.2 - Reporting

State Regulations

The owner or operator of a facility regulated under this

Part must submit an annual report on forms prescribed by the department as
required in section
360.19
(k)(3)
of
this Title, and must submit all water quality monitoring results as required by
section
363-4.6
(f)(10)
of
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
363-8.2

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
